title: "Israeli ministries slow to adopt AWS, Google cloud services"
excerpt: "To allow government companies and ministries to move to AWS and Google, the Ministry of Finance Accountant General's office led by Yali Rothenberg, which was responsible for the Nimbus tender, added several sub-tenders, including for a consulting company that would help the government ministries move to the cloud."
